thread.title: Great location and good value with quality
thread.title_full: Great location and good value with quality - Review of Doubletree by Hilton London - Westminster, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: paulriddiford
title: Great location and good value with quality
text: A short walk from Pimlico tube and a few others. Great for Tate, Westminster and London Eye. Staff are very accommodating. Upgraded for anniversary to Hilton rewards room on 9th floor. Good size room with working air con. Bathroom on smalls side but all very clean and comfortable queen bed. Apple macs in room and free wifi. All in all great value for London.
